neuralnetworksimulator

Class NNSample

  • java.lang.Object
    • neuralnetworksimulator.NNSample

  • public class NNSample
extends java.lang.Object

    Neural network sample

    Training/testing sample instance for any kind of neural network. Gives fields to register the last error information connected to this sample.
    Author:
    Najib
